name: 14 Nights With Beatrice
summary:
14 Nights With Beatrice is an upcoming 3D survival horror game with a strong focus on narrative, player choice, and multiple endings.

Players must survive a zombie outbreak by defending a house using light-based mechanics, managing limited resources, and making decisions that influence relationships and story outcomes.

The game emphasizes atmosphere, mystery, and branching storylines where choices directly affect the ending.

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
summary: Shadows over Silesia is a dark action adventure game with fantasy elements, set in real medieval Europe. With true historical events in the background, you can mainly expect challenging puzzles and difficult battles, but also stealth scenes and important decisions. You will come across possessed devil worshipers, sexual demons, and beasts from hell, as well as creatures well-known from European mythology.

name: 14 Days With You
summary: "14 Days With You" is an 18+ romance/horror visual novel centred around Ren; a mysterious individual who seems more than obsessed with you — and is willing to do anything he can to have you.

1402 is a chic twist on a classic puzzle game. Be enchanted by 14 ballads, including the world’s first Valentine’s love letter, set to music for the very first time. Dive into 15th-century France, where every tile tells a story, and every move gets you closer to the crown of French kings.

140 is an indie 2D rhythm puzzle-platformer. The game features high interactivity between the soundtrack and the environment around the player, and how the player must traverse this unwieldy environment.

name: 1 4 the $
summary: 1 4 the $ ("One For the Money") was written in three days as an entry to the SeedComp! 2024 sprouting round. It tells a story of consumption. It is intended for mature audiences.

name: 1492: Colonization of the New World
summary: Chart your nation's rise in 1492 Colonization of the New World, a turn-based strategy game where you explore, settle, trade, and lead your colonies to independence amid rival empires and native alliances during the Age of Discovery.

name: 14: Overmind
summary:
Distant future. A black hole emerges in Earth’s orbit, releasing a huge amount of anomalous energy. Earth and everything
near it is destroyed.
Near the spaceship “Miner”, surrounded by debris, an engineer comes to his senses, left completely alone. He remembers
nothing about who he is, where he came from, or how he ended up here, in the cold, endless space…
The only thing that guides him is the instinct for survival and the desire to find answers to the questions: what really
happened and why did he survive?

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The deluxe edition includes 1428: Shadows over Silesia, the soundtrack and two written stories from the world of the game.

1428: Shadows over Silesia
Medieval Europe is in the middle of religious upheaval and many a preacher predict the imminent end of the world. Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy story with true historical events in the background. You'll be facing intricate puzzles, challenging battles and cunning stealth.

Soundtrack
Listen to the soundtrack, which contains most of the in-game music from 1428: Shadows over Silesia. The tracks were composed by a trio of composers - Dark Fantasy Studio, Matyas Vonz and Jan Valta. Some of the tracks are originally composed for the game. For example, God Warriors is a variation on the medieval Hussite chant "Ye Who Are Warriors of God".

Bonus stories
This DLC contains two PDFs with unique short stories from the world of 1428: Shadows over Silesia. Read on to embark on your next adventure with Hynek and Lothar. The stories are available in two languages - Czech and English.

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The deluxe edition includes 1428: Shadows over Silesia, the soundtrack and two written stories from the world of the game.

1428: Shadows over Silesia
Medieval Europe is in the middle of religious upheaval and many a preacher predict the imminent end of the world. Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy story with true historical events in the background. You'll be facing intricate puzzles, challenging battles and cunning stealth.

name: 1414: Crossroads
summary: An RPG adventure, based on old-school, retro 2D games.

name: 14 Minesweeper Variants
summary: 14 Minesweeper Variants is... well, 14 minesweeper variants. What else would you expect? By the way, guessing is not required in this game.

name: 14 Minesweeper Variants 2
summary: Minesweeper but the rules are changing, again.

name: 1428: Shadows over Silesia - Tourney at the Bear Rock
summary: Dive into the thrilling world of knight tournaments! Help Hynek compete in jousting, man-to-man combat and archery, as well as to carry out a mysterious quest that will change his life forever.
The story of the writer Mike Williams, a specialist in paranormal phenomena, he is sent to the dead city of Centralia to search for inspiration, to finish writing your book on the paranormal.
14/? is an exploration game where you explore strange rooms while walking through doors that lead you to other strange rooms.

name: 14 Locks
summary: Can you unlock all 14 locks? Look around using your mouse or trackpad, move forward or backward using the cursor keys. Explore your enviroment and click the correct 3-digit code on the keypad on the door in each room.

name: 14Days in Dream
summary: 梦一场，爱一生 梦与现实间的7天里，真相与隐情逐渐浮出水面，再一次鼓起勇气拥抱爱！

Engage in deadly shootouts with a diverse arsenal of weaponry in this fast competitive online FPS. The objective: Get the encrypted data back to the source. Find the encrypted key and activate the data SLOT, a pyramidal dock with the power of sending the data back to ATMOS.

name: 1497: Five Years After
summary: 1497: Five Years After is a Colonization/Civilization like strategy game, in which you are sent to explore and conquer the New World for your King. The game begins five years after the discovery of the New World. You are the captain of a cargo ship and your mission is to wipe out all the rivaling European powers from the New World.

Starring Cristobalín, a somewhat lazy student who must prepare for the Conquest of Granada if he wants to pass his History class. While studying in the library, he falls asleep and begins to dream something "incredible." A fun adventure, lacking in humor, and through which you'll also learn about the Conquest of Granada.
